name: WashOff
description:
Wash Off is a wacky two player competitive laundry washing game set in space. The player's goal is to race through the level completing as much laundry as possible in a 10 minute time period. Using the randomized item spawners on both floors of the level the player can freeze, splash, and boost their way to victory in Wash Off!

This page stores both the original capstone version of Wash Off and will also be used for the uploading of future versions of the game alongside the original version, original version is being held here for portfolio purposes.

Capstone Version released on Sept 17th 2021
